title: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED: After-Phase Between the Stars
synopsis: As the war between ZAFT's Coordinators and Earth's Naturals comes to a close, the survivors of the conflict recuperate. Some of these veterans heal with the aid of loved ones, and others choose to recover in isolation, reflecting on their losses and the friends no longer with them.
related_anime: ['Mobile Suit Gundam SEED', 'Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Destiny']
